block.p: Elizabeth Anne Wadsworth and Barry Wine are to be married today at Mr. Wine's weekend house in New Paltz, N.Y. The Rev. Dennis W. Jones, a Presbyterian minister, is to perform a nondenominational ceremony.

The bride is a director of business development in New York for Trivnet, an Internet software company. She graduated from Johns Hopkins University and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. She is the daughter of Jean and Donald Wadsworth of Basking Ridge, N.J.

Elizabeth Anne Wadsworth and Barry Wine are to be married today at Mr. Wine's weekend house in New Paltz, N.Y. The Rev. Dennis W. Jones, a Presbyterian minister, is to perform a nondenominational ceremony.

The bride is a director of business development in New York for Trivnet, an Internet software company. She graduated from Johns Hopkins University and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. She is the daughter of Jean and Donald Wadsworth of Basking Ridge, N.J.

The bridegroom is a hotel and restaurant consultant in New York. He was a co-owner and the chef of the Quilted Giraffe, the former New York restaurant. He graduated from Tufts University and received a law degree from the University of Chicago. He is the son of Grace Silverman of Milwaukee and the late Irving Wine, and the stepson of Lillian Wine of Detroit and of Jack Silverman.
The bridegroom's first marriage ended in divorce.
